attributes.comment:
To Whomever This May Concern:
Please reconsider changing the fee for doing an international adoption. Due to the
longer timelines to adopt, particularly from China, these forms expire before the
adoption is completed and most of us are having to renew our application and pay
again. International adoption is expensive as it is, and when you have to already pay
twice, these costs can add up. Please consider extending the timelines in the 171
before upping the price. Perhaps the reason you are having to handle so many of
these applications is because we are having to do them twice. If you extend the
deadline, there will be less work on your part. Upping the price is a lousy answer for
those of us who have already had to pay once. Thank you for your time. Sincerely,
Irene Mok

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Irene J. Mok
